com.github.fge.filesystem.watch

Class NopWatchService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.filesystem.watch.NopWatchService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, WatchService

    @Immutable
public final class NopWatchService
extends Object
implements WatchService
    A no-op WatchService implementation

    As its name tells, this implementation will never return any WatchKeys. This means that if you try and take() from it, you will sleep forever until the watch service is closed, and will be greeted with a ClosedWatchServiceException.
